title.narrative: DMDP 2020 - Hand in Hand Int., Afghanistan

description.narrative:
Organic growth: taking Afghanistan’s first organic saffron value chain to scale
Valued at USD 21.23M, Afghanistan’s saffron exports are big business – and growing bigger by the year. Hand in Hand and its commercial partner Conflictfood aim to establish and scale the first-ever line of certified organic saffron produced and processed in Afghanistan, a value chain that will transform lives. On the development side, growing and processing this climate-resilient, labour-intensive crop will create 4,500 sustainable livelihoods, 70% of them women’s. On the commercial side, it will unlock new European markets and catalyse a USD 75m market for organic Afghan saffron within 10 years. The project contributes to SDG8 targets 8.2 (labour intensive sectors), 8.3 (decent job creation), 8.4 (decouple growth from environmental degradation) and 8.5 (decent work, equal pay).
